results.description: Follow live coverage of Crotone v Juventus and Real Madrid v Athletic Bilbao, plus updates from Caen v PSG in the French Cup semi-final.
results.shortTitle: European football: Ronaldo scores late equaliser for Real Madrid
results.title: European football: Real Madrid losing to Athletic Bilbao

results.description: Inter Milan extend their winless run in Serie A to eight games with a draw against lowly Crotone.
results.title: Inter Milan 1-1 Crotone

results.description: Barcelona travel to Valencia in La Liga, Monaco host Paris St-Germain in Ligue 1 and Juventus play Crotone in Serie A - follow live text commentary.
results.shortTitle: Valencia v Barcelona - La Liga's top two meet
results.title: La Liga: Valencia v Barcelona

results.description: Adel Taarabt is one of two Genoa players sent off in injury time after Inter Milan score a late winner.
results.title: Inter Milan 1-0 Genoa

results.description: Edin Dzeko suggests he will stop taking penalties after missing a second in five Serie A games for Roma, who win 2-0 at Crotone.
results.title: Crotone 0-2 Roma

results.description: Juventus go seven points clear at the top of Serie A as Gonzalo Higuain scores his 16th league goal of the season in a 2-0 win at Crotone.
results.title: Crotone 0-2 Juventus

thumbnail.altText: Juventus forward Gonzalo Higuain celebrates scoring against Crotone
